        <u_project_name display_value="Equinix Legal Service Delivery Project">ac3b3b52c308221052237405e40131f8</u_project_name>
        <u_project_work>LGL 126 : GLOSS pop-up language for transfer request:
-  Added a new component under the category field.
-  Created a client state parameter to control the visibility of the alert.
- Created a system property to store the Sys ID of the Gloss Request.
- Created a Data Resource to call the system property, and also set up a data broker ACL.
-  Modified the filter subcategory client script.
- The story has been completed and moved to SIT.

Venka:
- Fix Button Visibility Issue.

Learning Course:
- Security Operations (SecOps) Fundamentals On-Demand - 2%.</u_project_work>
        <u_remarks/>
        <u_resourse display_value="Suchithra PS">864718698381e650a946f896feaad336</u_resourse>
